introduction: Hello, my name is [Name]. I work for a public opinion firm, and we are conducting a survey with people in this area. I have nothing to sell you. I'm only interested in your opinions and the opinions of others.

smoking_question.question: Does anyone in this household smoke cigarettes?
smoking_question.next_steps: ASK Q.B THEN GO TO PAGES-2 NON-SMOKING HOUSEHOLDS

ethnic_interest.question: We are interested in talking to Hispanic people from various ethnicities.
ethnic_interest.note: CONTINUE. MAY OR MAY NOT HAVE TO TERMINATE LATER DUE TO ETHNIC QUOTAS.

employment_question.question: Do you or any of your relatives or close friends work for (1) a tobacco company, (2) an advertising agency, or (3) a marketing research company or field service?

contact_person.question: May I ask who I am speaking with?
contact_person.name: Last
